title: Radiomics predicts who will benefit from chemotherapy

title_detail.value: Radiomics predicts who will benefit from chemotherapy

summary: Using data from computed tomography (CT) images, researchers may be able to predict which lung cancer patients will respond to chemotherapy, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Using data from computed tomography (CT) images, researchers may be able to predict which lung cancer patients will respond to chemotherapy, according to a new study.
